hotels.title: Stylish Downtown Phoenix Stay next to Sporting Arena with Rooftop Pool, Bar & Restaurant
hotels.description: Discover sophisticated stylings and unrivalled luxury right in the heart of Phoenix with a stay at Kimpton Hotel Palomar Phoenix, an IHG Hotel. Anchored by the buzzing shopping destination, CityScape, this hotel claims an incredible city-centre locale that invites guests to explore invigorating sports, unique shows, tempting stores and dining experiences. For panoramic views of the city, relaxing poolside on the rooftop is ideal, or take your tastebuds on a culinary journey with a booking at Blue Hound Kitchen & Cocktails.
